main.name: Hassan Abdulle
main.bio: Hello there! I am tech enthusiast and I love dabling in different technologies! My passions includes learning how to solve problems using modern technology and also playing soccer!
main.contactmessage: Please contact me if you are interested in getting to know me further!

education.description: Completed the Computer Engineering program which allowed me to obtain practical experience in both the software and hardware domain.

work.title: Senior Apple Technician
work.description: Offered second level support for iOS, macOS, Apple Watch, Account Security and Wireless Multimedia departments. Addressed both internal and customer inquiries by solving problems. Highly proficient with logging and support tools used to document and troubleshoot issues, including company databases. Developed a reputation as an top advisor always exeeding company stats expectations.

work.title: Computer Engineer Intern
work.description: Assisted in developing database which stored technical procedures. Analyzed existing SQL queries to identify opportunities for improvements. Also assisted with updating and maintaing department website

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

He must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
